attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!
attributes.review: This app ruined my phone it took FOREVER to download and when it finally did download I couldn’t even open the app and get in because it kept glitching the worst part is IT HACKED MY PHONE. My posts on different social media plat forms would be deleted along with pictures and videos a few apps and notes. I don’t understand why they would have an app to mess with people like that it’s horrible. Worst app I’ve ever downloaded.

attributes.title: VERY BAD
attributes.review: Now i’ve talked to many app developers some are the best in the world i tell you they’re one of the bestests people we can get down here. This app is a SCAM. It sells all your information to overseas industries. I’ve received numerous calls claiming that the U.S. president is taking everyone’s banking information personally to deposit checks. Although i told him my credit card info i didn’t let them get my social security once I caught on. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever unbelievable
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took 16 weeks to download and on top of that my phone started over heating when using it. I started getting weird text messages in different languages. This app gave my phone number and email out to who knows who. When I’m not using this app it is always in use I will close the app and it will keep popping back up. It’s like someone is watching me and what I say.

attributes.title: Worst app in the world
attributes.review:
This broke my whole phone! I had to get a flip phone as a replacement because trumps face wouldn’t get off my phone screen and I got sick from looking at it too much ! I can not believe how bad this app is and how much it broke everything it was on! Trump 2020 will never happen because of this app! I had to go to the doctor because I looked at me Cheeto mans face for too long and the doctor couldn’t fix my sickness! 

 THE MANNY WILL NOT BE TELEVISED!

I downloaded this app because i obviously love mr. shrimpy and it BROKE MY PHONE, i had to buy a new one just to write this review as the 5 phone places i went to said my old phone was unfixable and the inside was completely filled with cheeto dust. i can no longer support trump after this, unacceptable.

you did that ✨👄🧚🏽 now never do it again

now you see not to mess with gen z? you can take away our beloved tik tok, but it will never stop

attributes.title: horrific.
attributes.review: this app is in support of the animal that promises to “make america great again”. but in all honesty, this app is making the app store horrible again!! i expect much better from an orangutan in office, we as americans should be APPALLED by the contents of this app. it downloaded at least TEN viruses to my phone while downloading, and it took over 35 hours to download!! this is such a disappointment and a real shame. the app store and app developers should be embarrassed.

I wanted to download this app to support the orange, non-sexist, bunker bastard. But it took 16 weeks to download. This app wasted all my data which wasted my money.  This app squandered so much of my money, I am now broke and my best friend is a homeless dude named tony. This app ruined my life making my guidance counselor a raccoon. I eat the garbage everyday and am currently trying to teach snails how to fist bump. My only plan now is to hopefully move to Canada and find a better app there to support from afar.

attributes.title: UNBELIEVABLE🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.review:
First this took about 2 months to download. 2MONTHS!!!!!! Then once it downloaded it erased ALL OF MY DATA BECAUSE THERE WASNT ENOUGH. I LOST EVERYTHING. when it opened it had asked for my number, which I put in. Then it proceeded to text me inappropriate text messages and threaten for me to send some back🤬. I can not believe this!! Then they threatened they were going to send me and my family TO ICE FOR NOT COOPERATING. THIS IS A COMPLETELY DISGUSTING APP AND IS FOR PEDOPHILES, HOMOPHOBIC, RACISTS🤬. 
Tbh rate- don’t like you and honestly kinda annoying🙈🤩

attributes.title: I’m so embarrassed 😔🖕🏽❌💩
attributes.review: This app took 8 days to download and then the very own trump 🤩💫🤩🥵 started sending me messages which is very disgusting and inappropriate for a MARRIED man to do , but I felt like what can I do ??? I mean I’m just a small town girl 😕 and he is the big famous orange 🍊 Cheeto man 👨. So when I didn’t answer his messages my whole phone screen and phone turned ORANGE 🍊 😤🤬 and my eyesight went orange . I’m so dissatisfied that he could take NO for an answer .DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🖕🏽😤

attributes.title: App doesn’t work right?
attributes.review: I tried downloading this app in order to gain more insight on our country’s president and what he stands for. After taking 840 minutes to download, it made me give them pretty much all of my information, which felt like an incredible invasion of privacy. I finally got into the meat and taters of the app, and all I found was racist, homophobic, and misogynistic propaganda. Very disappointed in this app, would not recommend
